name: Digital Cultural Center for the Children and the Art
goal: The Digital Cultural Center for the Children and the Art is a digital museum that presents he history of art simplified for children aged 0-18, game- based learning, digital tools, library, whole family learning,educational programs, art exhibitions, art toys, art books, training and fun
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Culture, Education, Research and Technology, Youth
